knimeNode.name: End IF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Merges two branches which were initially created by an IF Switch Node.

fullDescription.intro: This nodes takes the data either from the top or bottom input port or concatenates the two tables if both branches contain data.
fullDescription.option: Duplicate row identifiers (RowID) occurring in the second table are not appended to the output table. This option is relatively memory intensive as it needs to cache the row IDs in order to find duplicates.
The output table will contain all rows, but duplicate row identifiers are labeled with a suffix. Similar to the "Skip Rows" option this method is also memory intensive.
Enables hiliting between both inputs and the concatenated output table.
